channel.title: Ya, i need help with getting new ppl when they log on and not being a member
channel.description:
okay.. im using a figment source... andd i hate that u have to be a member.. sooo i was wondering if theres a code out there that can be like
[code]ifnewplayer = true (i dono how to code this part :S but ya.. something like that... then it writes the name into the member.txt if anyone can come up with a code and pm or like post it that would be greatly appreciated ty..)[/code]

item.title: Ya, i need help with getting new ppl when they log on and not being a member
item.dc:creator: @BACON555 BACON555
item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

box, if you goto the playerhandler.txt or .java - most likely in .txt format -.- lol uhm then search “ismember” change that 0 to 1 itll SAY your a member but you wont be till u get added to the member.txt in teh “data” folder… lol thats what ppl dont understand… making a file writer for ppl who log in and kicking them to where they will relog will make them member… thats what i want!! lol

} else if newplayer = true try { (" +name+"

kind of a small code… i dont even know if it will work when i finish it… lol i need a bit of help finishing it any who… but ya… lol

Read full topic

item.title: Ya, i need help with getting new ppl when they log on and not being a member
item.dc:creator: @hootywooty hootywooty
item.description:
@hootywooty wrote:

bacon did your create your accont before or after the code i gave you because the last code i just gave you only makes new acconts nonmember. so it doesnt effect existing players.
hope that made since.
to turn a existing accont to nonmember go to the character folder find the persons name you don’t want to be member and scrool down until you see character-ismember = 1 and just change the 1 to a 0
